BattleMes.txt__0: * Penceller and Eraserhead block the way!
BattleMes.txt__2: * Penceller is trying to sharpen its pencil.
BattleMes.txt__3: * Eraserhead attempts to adjust its glasses,\n\tbut can't quite reach them.
BattleMes.txt__6: * A pair of pencils stand tall in your path.
BattleMes.txt__8: * The duo is sharpening their pencils loudly.
BattleMes.txt__10: * Three sharp lads block the way!
BattleMes.txt__11: * The trio argues who has the better pencil.
BattleMes.txt__13: * Build up your TP by DEFENDING.
BattleMes.txt__14: * Once you have enough TP, select the APPREHEND ACT.
BattleMes.txt__15: * Damage the criminal enough to make it easier\n\tto APPREHEND.
BattleMes.txt__16: * Use Cole's NON-LETHAL SHOT ACT to lower\n\tthe criminal's HP without making them flee.
BattleMes.txt__17: * Kanako seems confused by this whole ordeal.
BattleMes.txt__18: * Mopper and its cohort cleans the way!
BattleMes.txt__20: * Mopper notices some stains near you.
BattleMes.txt__23: * A pair of mops mops the path.
BattleMes.txt__24: * The moppers are competing to see\n\twho mops the best.
BattleMes.txt__25: * A lone mopping mopper mops the way.
BattleMes.txt__26: * The Fort Defenders stand in your path!
BattleMes.txt__28: * Pennilton screams something about him being\n\tnumber one.
BattleMes.txt__29: * Pennilton almost drops his bag of coins.
BattleMes.txt__32: * Pennilton lets out a deep sigh.
BattleMes.txt__34: * Kanako has learned a new SPELL.
BattleMes.txt__35: * Shoot down [color=yellow]yellow[/color] bullets by pressing INTERACT.
BattleMes.txt__38: * Ringo is whipping up a storm.
BattleMes.txt__39: * Ringo can't stop ringing his bell.
BattleMes.txt__43: * Kanako tries to cover her ears, but it's useless.
BattleMes.txt__45: * Bearing is pulling out his stuffing.
BattleMes.txt__47: * Bearing is trying to keep his stiches from opening.
BattleMes.txt__48: * Bearing goes on a monologue about how he hates lightners.
BattleMes.txt__49: * Bearing is worried about new stiches opening up.
BattleMes.txt__50: * Bearing tries to roar, but a squeak sound\n\tcomes out instead.
BattleMes.txt__51: * The fountain roars in the background.
BattleMes.txt__53: * The air is filled with familiarity.
BattleMes.txt__57: * Sadness fills Foxlace's eyes.\n* Then anger.
BattleMes.txt__58: * Foxlace begs to not be forgotten again.
BattleMes.txt__60: * Kanako sees her reflection against Foxlace's visage.
BattleMes.txt__63: * Foxlace seems ready to move on.
BattleMes.txt__66: * Axis' body makes many clicks and clacks.
BattleMes.txt__67: * Axis seems to be running low on steam.
BattleMes.txt__68: * Axis tries to keep his body from falling apart.
BattleMes.txt__69: * Kanako tries to reason with Axis.\n* He doesn't listen.
BattleMes.txt__71: * A gear grinds into your path.
BattleMes.txt__74: * The gears are coming to a halt.
BattleMes.txt__75: * Gearzerd spins around without a care in the world.
BattleMes.txt__76: * A pair of gears keep the machine running.
BattleMes.txt__77: * The gears are trying to decide which direction to spin.
BattleMes.txt__78: * A full gear box assembles itself.
BattleMes.txt__82: * Staplete whines as it runs out of clips.
BattleMes.txt__86: * Drill-Er is revving up its drill.
BattleMes.txt__87: * Drill-Er is running out of fuel.
BattleMes.txt__89: * Drill-Er is scanning the area for hostiles.\n* It has found you.
BattleMes.txt__92: * There is some measuring contest going on.
BattleMes.txt__93: * An entire team of school supplies blocks\n\tthe path!
BattleMes.txt__95: * Some sharp lads and their cohorts take point!
BattleNarration.txt__1: * [NAME] tried to spare [TARGET], but it wasn't [color=yellow]willing[/color].
BattleNarration.txt__3: * Cole shot a rubber bullet at [TARGET]!
BattleNarration.txt__4: * You tell Eraserhead his style is lame.\n* He actually agrees with you.
BattleNarration.txt__5: * You tell Eraserhead to take life easy.\n* He agrees with you.
BattleNarration.txt__6: * [NAME] rubbed some dirt off Eraserhead's head.\n* He seem pleased.
BattleNarration.txt__7: * [NAME] tried again to rub Eraserhead's head,\n\tbut it seems he don't want any more.
BattleNarration.txt__8: * [NAME] attempted to sharpen Penceller's pencil.\n* He's insulted that you even dare suggest that.
BattleNarration.txt__9: * [NAME] attempted to sharpen Penceller's pencil.\n* He seems delighted.
BattleNarration.txt__10: * [NAME] attempted to sharpen Penceller's pencil,\n\tbut he wasn't having none of it.
BattleNarration.txt__11: * You talk to Penceller about being his friend.\n* He seems to like that idea.
BattleNarration.txt__12: * You tell Penceller his drawings suck.\n* He is deeply hurt by this.
BattleNarration.txt__14: * You part encouraging words upon Kanako...\n* Her AT went up for this turn!
BattleNarration.txt__15: * You tell Kanako to keep going.
BattleNarration.txt__16: * Press the INTERACT button to\n\tattempt to catch the criminal!
BattleNarration.txt__18: * [TARGET] resisted arrest!\n* Try lowering their HP more.
BattleNarration.txt__21: * Kanako hits the enemy without mercy.
BattleNarration.txt__23: * [NAME] cast a shield over your SOUL!
BattleNarration.txt__24: * You tried taunting Pennilton, but he didn't respond.
BattleNarration.txt__25: * You taunt Pennilton with childish insults.\n* Pennilton's AT went UP!\n* Pennilton's DF went DOWN!
BattleNarration.txt__26: * [NAME] tried talking to Pennilton, but he ignores you.
BattleNarration.txt__27: * [NAME] tries to convince Pennilton to come in quietly.\n* Pennilton's AT went down!
BattleNarration.txt__28: * You try to tell Mopper it is doing a good job.
BattleNarration.txt__30: * It is too busy to notice you.
BattleNarration.txt__31: * Mopper is happy its hard work is being appreciated.
BattleNarration.txt__32: * You throw some trash on the floor.
BattleNarration.txt__34: * [NAME] tries to help Mopper clean some of the mess,\n\tbut it won't let you.
BattleNarration.txt__35: * [NAME] helps Mopper clean some of the mess.\n* It seems pleased.
BattleNarration.txt__36: * Everyone begged Foxlace for forgiveness.\n* It looks upon the party sadly.
BattleNarration.txt__37: * Everyone begged Foxlace for forgiveness.\n* Tears fills its eyes.
BattleNarration.txt__38: * Everyone braced for impact.\n* DF increased for a few turns!
BattleNarration.txt__41: * Everyone tried to plead with Bearing.
BattleNarration.txt__42: * [NAME] tried to ask Foxlace forgiveness\n\tfor whatever they did.
BattleNarration.txt__43: * It refuses to listen to you.
BattleNarration.txt__44: * It is starting to listen to reason.
BattleNarration.txt__45: * Listening to Kanako, it relents.\n* Foxlace's AT and DF went down for a few turns!
BattleNarration.txt__46: * [NAME] asked Axis to go easy on the party.
BattleNarration.txt__47: * He thinks about it.\n* AT DOWN for a few turns!
BattleNarration.txt__48: * He thinks about it.\n* DF DOWN for a few turns!
BattleNarration.txt__49: * [NAME] tried to trick Axis with a logical paradox.
BattleNarration.txt__50: * Doesn't seem to have had too much effect.
BattleNarration.txt__51: * [NAME] tried to cover their ears.\n* It only makes things marginally better. DF UP.
BattleNarration.txt__52: * You tried asking Ringo to tone it down.\n* He rings harder, but is distracted. DF DOWN.
BattleNarration.txt__53: * You tried ignoring the noise.\n* Ringo's feelings are somewhat hurt. AT DOWN.
BattleNarration.txt__54: * [NAME] pressed down on Staplete's head,\n\tbut it doesn't have any staples left.
BattleNarration.txt__55: * [NAME] pressed down on Staplete's head.\n* It spits out some staples.
BattleNarration.txt__56: * [NAME] pressed down on Staplete's head.\n* It seems to have ran out of staples!
BattleNarration.txt__57: * [NAME] tried to pet Staplete, but it's too depressed to react.
BattleNarration.txt__59: * [NAME] attempted to spin Gearzerd around,\n\tbut there was little success.
BattleNarration.txt__60: * [NAME] spun Gearzerd around.\n* It enjoys that a lot.
BattleNarration.txt__61: * [NAME] applies some oil to Gearzerd.\n* Gearzerd can now spin better.
BattleNarration.txt__62: * [NAME] attempted to oil up Gearzerd,\n\tbut Gearzerd is already oiled up.
BattleNarration.txt__63: * [NAME] began to spin in place.\n* [TARGET] seems amused.
BattleNarration.txt__64: * [NAME] sprays the party with a stimulant substance!\n* Everyone's AT went up for a few turns!
BattleNarration.txt__65: * [NAME] sprays the party with a stimulant substance!
BattleNarration.txt__68: * [NAME] starts blaring loudly!\n* All enemies focus their attention on him!
BattleNarration.txt__69: * [NAME] offers [TARGET] to fix up Axis\n* It eagerly agrees!
BattleNarration.txt__70: * [NAME] tries to refuel [TARGET].\n* It is now raring to go! (AT UP)
BattleNarration.txt__71: * [NAME] spreads their arms so [TARGET] can\n\ttake measurements.\n* It seems happy.
BattleNarration.txt__72: * [NAME] starts talking about how circles are\n\tbetter than lines.\n* [TARGET] is displeased at this.
BattleNarration.txt__73: * [NAME] spreads their arms so [TARGET] can\n\ttake measurements, but it is still upset at\n\thow you acted earlier.
